title: Pipeline
description: Configure and run the analysis phases

warnings.noLlmDesc: Phases 6 and 7 are disabled. Some Phase 8 visualizations won't be generated. You can change the mode in Settings.
warnings.ollamaOfflineDesc: Phases 6 and 7 require Ollama to run the local model. Start Ollama or switch to API / No-LLM mode in Settings.
warnings.noModelsDesc: Ollama is active but has no downloaded models. Download a model from Settings to use phases 6 and 7.
warnings.modelMissingDesc: Selected model "{{model}}" is not installed in Ollama. Select another model or download it from Settings.
warnings.noDataset: Load a dataset in the "Data" section before running the pipeline.

completed.title: Analysis completed!
completed.description: All phases have run successfully. Review the results and visualizations.

toast.stoppedRolledBack: Partial changes have been rolled back. The system is in its previous state.

phaseWarnings.phase7Slow: This phase may take a long time due to the complexity of summarizing multiple reviews. Depending on the dataset and model, it can take from several minutes to over an hour.
phaseWarnings.smallModelSummary: The selected local model is small (< 10 GB). Summary quality may be affected. API mode is recommended for better results.
phaseWarnings.smallModelTopics: The selected local model is small (< 10 GB). Topic analysis quality may be affected.
phaseWarnings.noLlmPhase8: No LLM available: topic and summary visualizations will not be generated.

disabledReason.noLlm: Requires a language model (LLM). Configure one in Settings.
disabledReason.ollamaOffline: Ollama is not running. Start Ollama to use the local LLM.
disabledReason.noModels: No models installed in Ollama. Download one from Settings.
disabledReason.modelMissing: Model "{{model}}" is not installed. Select another or download it in Settings.

alreadyRunning: A phase is already running. Wait for it to finish before starting another.
